page.title: 03WILLOUGHBY SCHOOL GAMES
page.content: {Over the moon and under the stars}is a skipping game in which we have a long rope and jump over and under it. {Elastic}needs three or four people: two stand in and the others stand out and jump in and on the elastic. Lots of rules are made for the game. {Sevenses}is a ball game in which you throw a ball in all different ways. If you drop it you are out.{Hot Rice}is a game which you can play with a lot of people. One child is "on" and that child has a ball. All of the other children go off and the child that has got the ball has to throw the ball at one of the other children. If it touches you, you are out. When the thrower has got all of the children then the first child that was caught is on and you start again.
